thread.title: Banks jolted as HP unplugs popular back-office software
thread.title_full: Banks jolted as HP unplugs popular back-office software

author: Financial News
title: Banks jolted as HP unplugs popular back-office software
text:
Banks jolted as HP unplugs popular back-office software By James Rundle 19 October 2015 Hewlett-Packard is set to retire a piece of post-trade software used by several major banks, potentially leaving back-office operations with a serious problem ahead of a critical period in over-the-counter markets.
